revised_title: Low-Pressure Measurements of Xenon Isothermals and Gas Density
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the isothermals of xenon at low pressures and determine its density. They used a microbalance technique to compare xenon to nitrogen, finding accurate density values and a molecular weight in close agreement with mass spectrograph results. This work aimed to establish xenon as a standard for comparing densities of heavy vapors, providing a valuable tool for future research.
